cause.description:
ok this may seem stupid to you but i think that something needs to be done about this. I mean people call others "fags" because the like a certain song or genre. I believe that people should just respect others choices in genres because its their personal choice and the fact that its music not then end of the world
1. respcet music
2. enjoy music
3. and hav fun with it
cause.mission: make people not rag on people for their taste in music
cause.name: end hatred against music genres
